title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
Ral kap anga kalin 402
Ram ni eng tak chu a awm a 499
Ram ni tla ngai lovah chuan 492
Ram nuam kan hmuh ngai loh a awm 483
Ram ropui tak lo thleng tur kan nghah van piahan a awm a 241
Ram thianghlima Lal lopiang chu 104
Ram tinah Kraws thihna hlu hi 357
Riangvaite leh hausate u rah thain rah rawh u 235
Rilru lawm zawngte u 65
Rilru lawmin kan fak a che 388
Ringtu zawng zawngte u 81
Rinin ram nuam a awm ka hria a 480
Rinna thla zar ila 214
Ro hlu ka nei lawmna thuruk 521
Ropuina ram kalsanin 174
